entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:02 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 7:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear

Visibility: 32.2 km
